Package com.example.eventapp.viewmodels

Class ScanQrViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.eventapp.viewmodels.ScanQrViewModel
public class ScanQrViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel for handling QR code scanning functionality in the application. This class interacts with the EventRepository to retrieve event data based on a scanned QR code hash. It also maintains a LiveData text label that can be used to display instructions or feedback to the user.

      Retrieves an event based on its QR code hash.
      Parameters:
      qrCodeHash - The hash associated with the event's QR code.
      Returns:
